amendment.description: To delay the effective date of the veterans contracting provisions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 652 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 652 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S5846; text: CR S5846) To delay the effective date of the veterans contracting provisions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 652 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 652 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Murray.
